## Private Member Attributes

### ArgStrings {#aec8afb3da18c349a0ca9de35755f4ef5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="ArgStringList llvm::opt::InputArgList::ArgStrings"
  labels = {["mutable"]}>
List of argument strings used by the contained Args.

This is mutable since we treat the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arglist">ArgList</a> as being the list of Args, and allow routines to add new strings (to have a convenient place to store the memory) via MakeIndex.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h/#l00400">400</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h">ArgList.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### NumInputArgStrings {#ae676854816f800a89602c2f00006d734}

### SynthesizedStrings {#a52ab4876d8696c8ca7a7c5dc9ce74e92}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::list&lt;std::string&gt; llvm::opt::InputArgList::SynthesizedStrings</>}
  labels = {["mutable"]}>
Strings for synthesized arguments.

This is mutable since we treat the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/opt/arglist">ArgList</a> as being the list of Args, and allow routines to add new strings (to have a convenient place to store the memory) via MakeIndex.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h/#l00407">407</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/option/arglist-h">ArgList.h</a>.
